name: Catawba Senior Center
category: American-Indian-owned Adult day programs in South-Carolina
description: This center offers services to tribal citizens aged 55 and older, including congregate meals, home-delivered meals, caregiver support, and various activities promoting physical well-being, learning, and creativity. They also provide nutritional services, case management, and home visits
services: American-Indian-owned Adult day programs in South-Carolina consultation
